title: Nautilus Reef September Update
body:
Hi Everyone!

Here’s the latest update on the Ocean Week Reef {{champion:111}}. In the last update we mentioned that we had found a suitable site. Well we’ve now lodged applications with the relevant government agencies! There’s no exact timeline or guarantee of approval, but we’ll keep you posted.

Now that the paperwork is in we’re working with a marine structural engineering company and a 3D artist to design the reef itself. We want the reef to have a positive impact on the environment, as well as look cool.

If/when the application is approved we’ll announce the location of the reef. Until then we’ll keep pushing this along. All in all, we’re in good shape!

http://i.imgur.com/bRzODGW.jpg

replies.body:
With your position changing from Community to eSports, has it been hard keeping this project "Afloat"?

I'll show myself out.

Hahaha, that's terrible!

This project has been challenging yet fun. The number of times I've had to explain this to government agencies, marine biologists, etc only to be met with a confused look is priceless.

I guess you could say, that they "overflowed" with confusion?

I guess that's the door for me too.
I laughed, should I join you two outside?
I thought it was swell.
So, is Sephyre out there with you? Or are you talking through the glass?
*Waving through the glass
I sea what you did there.
All I seal is appointment after seaing these posts.
These Puns just Wash away all other pun related posts, I've been sucked into the powerful undertow of the pun universe, Im gonna join you guys outside
well at least no one here is being a beach about all these jokes
omg this is the funniest chain I've ever sean.
I waded 3 months to make this joke.{{champion:32}}
Really guys? Water you all doing making these ridiculous ocean-themed puns?
Yeah that would be sandening
i quit... :P

Sea you next time, have an ice day and stay safe when surfing the ocean of the internet, stay afloat! Wouldn't want to drift offshore and get lost. Remember to bring a map!
:DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
pun city
any update for the nautilus reef?
We're moving along well and I'm hoping to have another update ready soon!

>Well we’ve now lodged applications with the relevant government agencies! 

Wait it took you several months to fill out forms?

Can you talk us through how this took so long because i'd like to at least understand how that makes sense.

I seriously thought you were waiting for approval for this post.

Unfortunately it's not as simple as just filling out forms. I wish!! The big ticket items which took the time were:

* Finding a site 
* Finding partners to work with (marine engineer, marine biologist, etc)
* Preliminary meetings with the relevant government agencies
* Preliminary designs based on the site

There are a number of interconnecting moving pieces which have had to be executed in the right order.

Hope my name is still going to be on it :P I did get the required amount of points.
Can't wait to see what it'll look like.
Me too!! Sadly though, I only managed to get two points thanks to an epic number of consecutive loses!
I changed my name from Cool Knight7000 will u guys put my old name or new one?
We're engraving (current tense, it's happening at the moment yaye!) the name you had at the time.

Why dont you have an ocean sale/  summer sale when this is taking place like you could put a bundle of skins with nami naut and fizz

"If/when the application is approved"
'if' seems to be a key word in that sentence, whats the plan if the reef is NOT approved?
If this particular site is knocked back there will likely be changes we can make. However if the application is flat out denied there are other suitable sites we can apply for.
